Reviews.Title: Surprisingly Awesome!!
Reviews.Author: Robert C Coquia Jr
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera cover for my Canon 60D from a friend's recommendation who had one his Canon T3i. When I saw his camera, I never knew something like this existed. I know they make silicone covers for just about every electronic gadget out there, but had yet to see it on a DSLR. At first I thought it was cheesy as do some of the silicone covers look out there, but when I felt it & saw how it was literally custom fit to the camera, I changed my mind. Many silicone covers fit a particular product, but have loose areas &/or slide off on certain parts of the electronic. This one fit like a glove. In addition, the cover didn't look like you were trying too hard to show the world, "hey, check out my completely silicone covered camera!" I guess the fact that it's black in color like the camera helped, but it doesn't give you that effect.The reason for my purchase on this, is that I bring my camera with me almost everywhere. If you care about your investment &/or are that person who likes to keep their gadget in pristine condition like day #1, then this is for you. I'm planning on travel abroad soon & want my camera body protected from the basic accidental bumps either I make or people & the world around me does. It doesn't protect your lens, but definitely the body. I will say that when I first got it, it took me a bit to get use to it as it makes the body a tad bit thicker & of course the feel. But once you do, you'll be glad you have it. Unfortunately the stock photo showing the cover does look cheesy & makes you wonder if it will even look good. IT DOES! It looks great!! If you read the other reviews (unfortunately only 3 thus far), they all have it for the same reason...added protection. I'm very careful with my gadgets & this will definitely give you that added level of comfort knowing your DSLR body is wrapped in it.

Reviews.Title: So glad I got this.
Reviews.Author: Horsebits
Reviews.Content: I'm so glad I got his for my camera. I had seen this cover available fir other models and was waiting for one to come out in my model. It finally did. My camera gets bumped around a lot as I wear it around my neck. When I bend over it tends to swing this way and that bumping thing. This cushy silicone cove has definitely saved it from these little bumps. The cover is molded to the shape of the camera, even over the buttons. It it not air tight or water tight as there are a number of openings for things like the lens and the back screen to flip out for taking movies. The good news is you don't have to remove the cover to use these camera functions. But sometimes the cover makes it slightly difficult to change lenses because it fits up close to that area. This cover is not what I would call skin tight, but it completely molds around the camera. It is like some of the "gelly" cell phone covers you can get for your phone.One negative is that although the camera function buttons are marked with indenting and symbols like on the camera itself, they are completely black, NOT painted in contrasting white, making it difficult to see what the button is without having to tip the camera and get up close to see the button. I guess you can't get paint to stick to the silicone. It does give it a sleek look. The silicone is very grippy. This makes it difficult to slide into my one backpack camera bag, but not my carry camera bag. It just depends on the design of the camera bag and how tight the fit is. Another thing is that lint sticks to the silicone--lint from the fabric in the camera bag, lint from your clothes when wearing it around your neck, pet hair if you are photographing animals. That is just the nature of the silicone product. The lint doesn't really wipe off, but you can blow it off with air or wipe with a lint free damp cloth.I could not live without this cover. It has paid for itself by protecting my camera from many bumps and dings. If you have to have direct feel of the camera and it's buttons against your hand, you may not appreciate this item. I'd rather keep my equipment safe and sacrifice a little direct contact.

Reviews.Title: Fits excellent without battery grip
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Easy to fit and easy to use, smooth, durable, the display protection is excellent, but doent work with battery grip

Reviews.Title: Works very well
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a non-bulky protection case for my Canon 60D.  Didn't really want a holster, just something to protect it a bit while hiking.  This fits the bill.  It makes the back dial a little more difficult to access, but it's worth it.  Doesn't replace a camera bag, but provides an extra level of comfort when you don't want to take the camera bag along.

Reviews.Title: As an OCD person, this is awesome
Reviews.Author: GuessWho530
Reviews.Content: As a person who has OCD when it comes to seeing even a very microscopic scratch on any kind of surface, this makes me feel a lot better when it comes to protecting my DSLR device. It also includes a hotshoe cover which is one of the biggest perks I have with this Skin Cover as I tend to hate the fact that the hotshoe mount always gets dusty or particles that are at times, really tough to clean out.Pros:Fits Perfectly on my 60D DSLRWon't scratch your DSLRNot a Lint MagnetIncluded Screen Protectors ( already have one by Zagg but keeping it as an additional back up)Allows the Swivel screen to come outCons:Attracts a bit of Lint, but not to the point that I would go crazy upon my OCDOverall:I would definitely love to recommend this to anyone with a 60D as my nails tend to swipe a scratch across the surface of the DSLR and my OCD levels are over the roof with scratches. Also buy the Screen Protectors from Zagg as they have one portion for the top of the display as well and is pretty much a bit better than the ones included in this one.

Reviews.Title: Great product...
Reviews.Author: Geoblime "Geoblime"
Reviews.Content: Awesome, just what I was looking for. Adds grip, non sliding, and protection to the camera. You have to get used to no labels on the camera where this cover is but once you know your camera it's fine. Very happy! One thing of note--when you have a flash on the hot shoe the flap from the skin that slides into the hot shoe receiver on the camera has to be folded up which kinda pushes the protective skin out and a little down into the view finder. Doesn't get in the way of seeing but bulges out. I could see this annoying some people but it was a non issue for me. Would buy again!

Reviews.Title: Looks and Feels Great
Reviews.Author: Michael DiDomenico
Reviews.Content: Just received this item today and it took about 40 seconds to place on the 60D. It is smooth to the touch, looks very durable and should offer me protection from the elements and from bumps as I travel around on my trips. All of the buttons are still easy to use, thou I would have liked white lettering. They are not hindered by the cover at all and it comes with a high grade LCD protector sheet.

Reviews.Title: This is an interesting product
Reviews.Author: Bryan
Reviews.Content: Based upon previous reviews, it does fit fairly snugly, provides adequate body protection as described. I only gave 3 stars because, it is a little difficult to attach or switch lenses while it is in place. The cover over the flash shoe is clumsy when trying to attach an external flash. All operating buttons/shutter covered and accessible, but I had difficulties in two areas: (1) because the entire Pro Skin is black, all the button function lettering also is black so unless you have all the function buttons memorized, it is nearly impossible to read the button functions especially in dim lighting situations and difficult to make adjustments quickly. (2) This may just apply to me, but I found it particularly troublesome when trying to push the shutter as I could not feel the actual pressure when attempting to lock focus when pressing the shutter button halfway. I will probably keep the item, using it only as a protective cover when packed in my bag while traveling, but will remove it when in the field and actually shooting (I might also keep it handy in case of rain or other inclement weather).

Reviews.Title: Perfect fit
Reviews.Author: Cristina Munoz "Mommy&Teacher;"
Reviews.Content: My camera had lost it's rubber protection. This covers it up nicely while still allowing me to use all the buttons. Wish I had found this sooner!

Reviews.Title: Good product!!
Reviews.Author: Lantz
Reviews.Content: Pro Skin fits really well and does a nice job protecting the cameras buttons and outer shell. Also trimming with scissors allows for a nice fit if you have a pro grip battery attachment on your camera as well.

Reviews.Title: Surprised, although does not work with grip.
Reviews.Author: Samuel
Reviews.Content: I have had this skin for about 5 months now.  It fits like a glove,  and has a great hand feel.  Much better than the camera alone.  Does not work a grip.  I had to trim little by little until the batteries would engage.  After cutting,  it does not fit as tight, but it is still a stellar product.  Get to know your camera buttons,  as it is hard to read the engraved words.  I feel that makes me more competent anyways.  My favorite feature is the camera model is hard to see,  and I think the skin makes your camera less appealing to a thief. Finish the look off with getting a camera strap that does not announce your model.Overall,  great product to keep your investment looking new.

Reviews.Title: simply perfect!
Reviews.Author: Andras Horvath
Reviews.Content: good price for this product! i'm delighted with it! thx ;) i can recommend it for everyone! ;) thx again!!!

Reviews.Title: Fits like a glove
Reviews.Author: Hassan Al Hashemi
Reviews.Content: Love the feel of the skin on my SLR. It protects my investment without getting in the way of operating the camera�

Reviews.Title: Keeps the camera like new!
Reviews.Author: MZypher "MZypher"
Reviews.Content: Great camera protection.  I do a lot of nature photography.  Back country hiking.  Mountain trails.  You get the idea.  My last camera had a similar case and when it was removed after 6 years, the camera looked brand new.  Not a scratch.  I wouldn't think of not having this on my camera.

Reviews.Title: just what I expected
Reviews.Author: jhoel tiniaco
Reviews.Content: protects my camera well, you have to press the buttons hard but it works without problems, improves grip of the camera to make it thicker, I'm happy

Reviews.Title: fits like a glove
Reviews.Author: Adam H "mobile ham"
Reviews.Content: This is a great cover for the camera body.  It really protects well and fits very snug.  I would consider this high quality.  All of the "buttons" on the case line up directly with the buttons on the camera.  If you want the extra protection for your camera, this is it.

Reviews.Title: Nice cover
Reviews.Author: Hassan
Reviews.Content: fits my 60D canon. easy to fit.just need use the edge of your finger to use scroll.Very low price for an item that gives you a protection for your camera

Reviews.Title: Good Grip
Reviews.Author: LLee "shopper68"
Reviews.Content: This skin makes it easier to grip my camera.  I can still put it in my case with the skin

Reviews.Title: Fits my Canon EOS 60D just right.
Reviews.Author: B. Buyack
Reviews.Content: I was a little worried if this would fit ok around the Canon EOS 60D, but it worked just fine.  You have to pop off the lens, and remove the carrying (neck) cord to install it.  Has a large opening on the bottom to slide on.  Fits just right around the camera body.  I'm still learning the 60D camera buttons and this doesn make it a little more difficult to see what the image would be on the buttons, but probably not as big of a deal for someone familiar with their camera.  It does make it a little more difficult to use the spinning dial on the back, and I've noticed the rubber insert into the flash adapter on top sometimes comes loose, but I think it's worth these little nuances for the additional protecction it provides for the body of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Would recommend to anyone!
Reviews.Author: Ron
Reviews.Content: Was skeptical about the quality of the product.But I am happy to say the product exceeded my expectations and is of very good quality.I would recommend this to my friends and family.Thanks!

Reviews.Title: Hard to notice - both ways!!!
Reviews.Author: Vinod Kamalam Surendran "vinod"
Reviews.Content: The good thing first! The skin is really helpful to protect your camera from sweat and dust. What is not right is the picture in Amazon to sell the product. The picture misleads the buyer in to thinking that there is a lens cover that goes along with the skin unless we read every word of the details and ignore the picture.

Reviews.Title: great protection
Reviews.Author: patoja
Reviews.Content: It fits perfect on my camera, protects it and its not too bulky.I recommend this product to any one that has a camera.The shipping was fast and the packing perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fits well but not quite what I expected
Reviews.Author: TEC
Reviews.Content: Fits well but cannot distinquish controls on the skin. I have a new camera and the colors and icons cannot be seen

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Joel S.
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my brother for Christmas and he has raved about it. Great protection and not bulky at all. Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: I absolutely love this product.
Reviews.Author: D. Fox
Reviews.Content: I wanted a product that would handle rugged use and Delkin produced it.  Application is easy and does not interfer with the functionality of the camera.  The grip is comfortable and allows one to have better control.  Peace of mind in knowing my camera is protected from scratches, is immeasurable.

Reviews.Title: Works but ...
Reviews.Author: kenneth edgein
Reviews.Content: The skin fits reasonably well and provides "OK" access to the controls.  The embossed words for each control are a bit difficult to read and I have to tilt the camera to get the right light on them.  This issue may go away as the controls become second nature to me [new camera and have to think or read the book sometimes to do something].  Also note that the skin interferes a little with installation seating of a vertical battery grip.  I will have to 1] use one or the other depending on circumstances, or 2] carefully trim the skin so it doesn't interfere with seating.  Hand "feel" is OK but not as nice as I would have liked ...may just need to get used to it but right now [after a week] it still isn't as comfortable as I expected.For the money it is worth a try but don't expect "perfection".

Reviews.Title: Not that great.
Reviews.Author: Luke Chmura
Reviews.Content: It fit the 60D well, but it had a few gaps here and there. The silicone made for a bit more slipperier surface. I didn't like that. If sand or whatever got in between the case and the camera it could really grind away at the body. I know this isn't very well written, but basically it was that great of a fit and made it easier to drop.

Reviews.Title: Fits well
Reviews.Author: Jerry "JJ"
Reviews.Content: Great product and would definitely buy another for a friend. Only problem I had was that, with the cover on the camera bod, the additional battery grip attachment could not make a connection to give power to the camera so I had to cut some of the snug fit skin in order to get the battery grip screwed on good enough to make a connection and give power to the camera.

Reviews.Title: WAY better than expected!
Reviews.Author: G. Bowman "BOODIE"
Reviews.Content: I was almost shocked at the quality of this skin.  VERY durable.  Has a nice smooth rubber/silicon feel to it.  NOT too thin, and not too balky either.  It's very easy to give this 5 stars.  The price and quality are enough to give it 10 stars.  :)I had no problems installing the skin.  Have been working with it on the camera for about a full 10 days now with NO problems.  It has never gotten in my way and I have never had to take it off.Don't hesitate, it's so worth the price.  $1600 camera, the least you can do is protect it....goes great with my screen protector!

Reviews.Title: Fits perfectly, but the picture on the WEB is incorrect.
Reviews.Author: marcelo Arze
Reviews.Content: I have a doubt about the Skin, becouse of the picture on the web page, it shows the scren moving down insted on the 60D it moves to one side, and order it anyway.The skin fits perfectly and was exactly what I needed for the 60D

Reviews.Title: Impressed.
Reviews.Author: LiveLikeLiz
Reviews.Content: It's very smooth and seems durable. It came so quickly, too! Unfortunately my 60D is getting cleaned so I can't put it on it. But so far I'm liking the case. It's a good quality.

Reviews.Title: Works as expected
Reviews.Author: Augusto Arcoverde da Rocha
Reviews.Content: Good finishing and no problems putting in the camera.Almost all body is covered and comes with two LCD protectors.

Reviews.Title: Fixes the 60D "grip problem"
Reviews.Author: Paul F
Reviews.Content: Many owners of the 60D have reported a problem with the rubber grip areas on the camera, in which the rubber separates from the camera.  It's a minor annoyance that cheapens the feel of the camera and may also affect the handling.  The Snug-it fixes this problem, albeit by hiding it!  It makes the camera look cool, too.  As another reviewer said, you'll have to memorize the functions of each button because the labels are just embossed but not colored.  However, every button, dial and access door are still easily operable.  The fit is precise.  The rubber is not very grippy, so handle with care.  Extra bonus: the hot shoe is covered, so you don't have to buy a cover, it that was ever your 'thing'.  It even slides in properly with that 'dovetail' fit.  Putting it on was pretty easy, too.

ProductInfo.Features:
Unique Protection
A hard plastic cover protects the LCD against damage
Snug-it Pro skins are perfectly molded around the lens mount to provide the maximum amount of coverage while still allowing for quick lens changes
Complete Coverage
Silicone covers as much of the camera as possible, including the hot shoe
ProductInfo.Name: Delkin Snug It Pro Skin for the Canon 60D Digital SLR Camera - Black
